headline.main: One Direction Singer Arrested at LAX After Altercation With Paparazzi
headline.print_headline: One Direction Singer Arrested at LAX After Altercation With Paparazzi

lead_paragraph: Louis Tomlinson, a singer with the "boy band" One Direction, was arrested after getting into a "physical altercation" with a photographer at Los Angeles International Airport, according to police records and media reports on Saturday.
snippet: Louis Tomlinson, a singer with the "boy band" One Direction, was arrested after getting into a "physical altercation" with a photographer at Los Angeles International Airport, according to police records and media reports on Saturday....
